title: Poison trail invisible when Singed offscreen
body: â€‹When Singed goes into fog of war, poison trail disappears. It reappears when he becomes visible again. Unsure whether it damages while invisible.

replies.body:
That has been considered by many to be a game mechanic by many for a while (although I disagree). Btw yes it damages.

Nunu's ult does the same thing when he is in a bush.
This at the moment is intended. Whenever Singed goes into hiding, his trail disappears - this also applies to any champion with skill abilities that telegraph to the opponent such as Sion and Nunu.
